website_summaries.verdict: QardioArm is an at-home blood pressure monitor and app that is dead-simple to use, read, and understand over time. It's a great device, although because it's from a smaller company, it might not be compatible with other systems you use.

customer_reviews.title: Works well out of the box but goes unreliable within days
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works well when you first get it but within a day or two it will not turn on without a fresh set of batteries each time. Interfaces well with the iOS health app. A great idea in terms of functionality and design appearance but not reliable enough to be useful for monitoring something as important as one's health
customer_reviews.author: Paul G Maidenhead

customer_reviews.title: Brill upper arm BPM.
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity for iPhone users. Seamless and automatic integration with IOS Health App. Triple measurement for better accuracy. Very compact and highly portable. Quick and easy to apply without silly tubes. Very well made. Just need to be more confident with readings as they differ (lower) than my old wrist BPM.
customer_reviews.author: Billinski

customer_reviews.title: Great Qardio
customer_reviews.text: The qardio is an excellent machine that seems to give consistently accurate readings. I recently purchased a similar Withings machine that was as inaccurate as the Qardio is accurate. this one is so easy to use compared to the cumbersomeness of Withings. Where Qardio additionally shine is with its excellent customer service and I believe they will shortly have a UK telephone helpline. The only annoying feature, and this, I believe, is more Amazon than Qardio, is that they either despatched the unit with flat batteries or its OLD stock
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Keeping record of BP.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine in June 2019 after a TIA. I have taken over 200 readings to date. I have only changed the batteries once. I record the readings on my IPad IOS13, and never had a problem. I am surprised at the number of 1 star reviews, I use mine very regularly and gives me confidence as to keeping an eye on my BP. John V
customer_reviews.author: John V

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working after a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: Initially it worked well. It was easy to set up and link to android smartphone. However by the second day, it failed - the cuff would not inflate beyond 70, producing an error message. I tried changing the batteries and again it worked a couple of times and then failed again. I swopped back to the original batteries and the same again - worked a couple of times, then failed. These failures completely undermine the reliability you need in a device of this kind. I've now returned it (Amazon prime)
customer_reviews.author: BWFC77

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I love technology so this is right up my street! It arrived on time and was well-packaged. The actual box is well designed and holds the BP monitor securely. I’d be quite happy having the box on my work desk although I haven’t done that yet. The monitor itself does a great job and seems as accurate as my existing cuff and press monitor. The ability to take three readings separated by a defined number of seconds and then averaging them is a great idea. I also love the album feature where you can gaze at your photos while having your BP taken - very relaxing. All in all, a good purchase and cheaper than buying it from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard in Nottingham

customer_reviews.title: Very poor manufacture and quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I have now had to return three of these items because they were faulty. The first failed to take a reading 50% of the time; the second failed to switch on and sync to the phone app 50% of the time then a part of the cuff fell off; the third didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: NDC

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Works via Bluetooth to my IPhone. Download and control via a free app. This keeps a record of your readings. It says medically approved on the box. I was able to show my doctor my readings last time I had an appointment. Well made. Compact so you can take in a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Kingbrill

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but ultimately flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Promised much but failed to deliver. Compact and stylish but completely inaccurate. The readings I was getting from this were 20% higher than those at my GP surgery. I bought a decent Omron M7 which is perfect and significantly greater quality and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Brevs

customer_reviews.title: Accurate easy to use and good app
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product for home use. It’s accurate and easy to use. Results show grata trending and have helped me change my lifestyle to the point stress is being managed weight being lost and salt intake reduced. Didn’t really need this it appears but the shock of having high blood pressure at a routine doc appointment compelled me to buy this. Turned out to be nothing, but that was only proven through use of this. So we’ll worth the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great idea - but dident work
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to this, as i have recently been diagnosed with high blood pressure, well i only got it to work once ! Keep faulse reading and error Z6.. which is the arm cuff.. returned, wish i had read the reviews more as alot of people seem to have the same issue..
customer_reviews.author: j m jones

customer_reviews.title: ... own blood pressure is at is of course very useful in assessing your general state of health
customer_reviews.text: Knowing at what level your own blood pressure is at is of course very useful in assessing your general state of health. If like me you have had high blood pressure for a number of years it is not very reassuring to have your pressure checked say 2 -3 times a year by the GP. That can only be a snap shot - and of course you run in - get 'white coat' syndrome - and your BP reads high. Having this electronic unit provides daily assurance that your BP and intake of prescribed tablets is OK. The Qardio unit is easy to use and as it has a built in history of readings is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jayc

customer_reviews.title: No ball and chain
customer_reviews.text: Far better than the device used by the doctors with its teether to an oversized box like a ball and chain. It also is configurable to perform up to three readings between a up to a minute apart to be that more accurate. However having had to use the teether for a 24 hour test it would be nice if it could be configured to test every twenty minutes as required by the doctor for 24 hour test.
customer_reviews.author: Mccres01

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Good app
customer_reviews.text: After years of using a traditional blood pressure monitor I decided to upgrade to the Qardio Arm. It's excellent. Compact. Very easy to use. Automatic recording of results on the iOS app is excellent for tracking results. I also appreciate features such as setting reminders in the app to test blood pressure and the ability to automatically test 2 or 3 times for best (most accurate) results. I only gave it 4 rather than 5 stars as the minor inconvenience of having to sign in to the app too often is a tad annoying. Still, I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: interbear

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today and all its done so far is put my blood pressure up due to frustration. I cannot get it to complete a measurement without stopping with an error. I must have tried about 30 times and only got 6 measurements. I've tried repositioning the cuff so many times and holding my arm in different positions. What's strange is that it worked 5 out of 5 times on my girlfriend no problem. Maybe some people have their arteries in different places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: QARDIOARM NOT FIT FOR PURPOSE
customer_reviews.text: I have routinely measured my BP for over 20 years with an OMRON monitor. I know the rules for getting best results, I eagerly awaited QARDIOARM Smart technology. Pairing with my iPhone, fitting the arm cuff and recording the results were easy. The BP figures compared favourably with my OMRON’s. My GP was interested. Soon, the QARDIO batteries expired, annoying but I persevered. However, the QARDIO ‘eats batteries’, requiring 4 AAAs every 7 to 10 days. At that rate they will cost more than £100 a year! Soon the QARDIO was cutting out more often than not, needing resetting each time, (presumably as batteries expire). So frustrating, raising my blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Topcat

customer_reviews.title: Worth the premium if you use Apple HealthKit a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, this is as good and as accurate as many others available for less money. What justifies the price for this, is the Apple HealthKit integration and the very good Qardio app. Being able to keep a history of readings, to track patterns and trends, or compare with other health data (eg activity, heart rate, sleep, weight, etc) is what you're paying for. All of that is exactly what I was looking for and I'm very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: RobM

customer_reviews.title: Works well but came with exhausted batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Came with flat batteries, not what I expect for an item costing so much. After installing fresh batteries product worked well giving a reading almost the same as my other BP measuring device and synched with iPhone with no problems, updating the health app at the same time. Had it not been for battery condition I would have given 5*.
customer_reviews.author: Albey

customer_reviews.title: No Pressure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product recently and its extremely poor considering the price! The battery compartment pops open all the time making it impossible to use, poor design, not well thought out at all! I definitely DON'T recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: RedFox

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, compact and super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Tested against the device at the doctors and got exactly the same result so trust its accuracy. Linked straight away with Samsung Health and the stand alone app provides good trended information. Fits comfortably and connects every time its needed Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Buzza

customer_reviews.title: just about to try and return the second one.
customer_reviews.text: First one failed almost immediately, second one is now only working when it wants. My blood pressure goes up just trying to get it to connect or most times even switch on... That said this item is not eligible for return but Amazon refunded the cost with no fuss. Sorry to be contacting them with the same problem as when you initially get the device and its working properly its brilliant. I give 2 stars on that basis and on Amazons no fuss approach to dealing with the issue. I would love to have one of thesethat works but hey ho....Time to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Steve E

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: By the time I have managed to connect the device to my phone, struggled with trying to fit the sleeve and tighten the cuff my blood pressure has gone through the roof. Device will not reconnect and I have to reboot my phone and re-pair the Bluetooth. Sleeve is difficult to fit one handed. Biggest waste of money ever. I've gone back to an ordinary monitor and noting the readings in a spreadsheet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Presents the information very well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, reasonable easy to use though it can be a bit fiddly to get it to reconnect to my phone if I haven't used the blood pressure monitor for a while. I still recommend this product, it's good at what its supposed to do and presents the information in a very user friendly way.
customer_reviews.author: Amie-May

customer_reviews.title: Professional, friendly support and lightening quick
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that from the first, the support given was first class. Professional, friendly and lightening quick. I am very impressed with both the product and support I have received. First monitor gave Z0 error straight out of the box, got onto support they suggested a couple fixes. Sadly these didn’t work, so within 36 hours I had a new one! The batteries have now lasted over five months, which considering the abuse I’ve given them, is spectacular
customer_reviews.author: Shufflinstan

customer_reviews.title: Just been taken seriously for high blood pressure after repeated ...
customer_reviews.text: Just been taken seriously for high blood pressure after repeated blood pressure readings over many years by docs always coming out on the rather high scale. I bought this product to keep a track for myself. It also helped to show my readings also. It gives you quite a bit of information through the app. Which allows you to plot your readings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned the bluetooth Withings monitor as both myself and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned the bluetooth Withings monitor as both myself and my wife use them, however it was very difficult to pair 2 phones to the one monitor. This one has no problem and the readings are the same as the backup Omron unit we use which is very accurate. Only small issue is knowing when the device is on or off as you need to pull on a tag to activate it and then it should go off when it is wrapped up again but there is no light to indicate when this happens as far as we can see.
customer_reviews.author: Jake H0YT

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this item now for a couple of months and it has proved to be an excellent piece of kit. It did however at one stage stop working and my interaction with the supplier was an satisfactory and disappointing. Their only advice was to get in touch with the manufacturer. Not what you expect now days really.
customer_reviews.author: Osters

customer_reviews.title: Woefully Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I have had this device for a while now, and I can honestly say that it is the most inaccurate BPM I have ever used. I have an Omron desktop device, and I am now testing a Withings BPM Connect. Both of these devices are spot on. When having my BP taken in the clinic both these devices match the readings their too. However the Qardio is alway so way off, I can no longer use it. Very disappointed, as this was my goto BPM travel device.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & very well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, well built & connects with Apple health. Just as an observation where the cuff slides through the metal retaining clip, there is lip of material which can fold under stopping you from rolling it up correctly for storage, when this happens you will need to fold it back through the clip. Took me a while to figure out so i hope this will help someone. Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Glen Davies

customer_reviews.title: Serious Design Fault
customer_reviews.text: •Turn the product on it works ✅ •Next day turn the product on ? U can’t U must take the batteries out and turn on again ❌ & do the same every day & not forgetting u must repair the blue tooth every day too ❌ • Wait there more ❓❓❓ •Your wife wants to use it & she must repeat the process as u both can’t be paired to it ❌❌ Not worh the money and design fault not to have on-off switch Imagine doing the same with weighing scales greedy drop shippers promote anything
customer_reviews.author: T Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Puts your blood pressure in context
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality item, which is easy to fit and comfortable on the arm. Unlike some other blood pressure monitors, it allows you to permanently say that you want to average three readings (rather than annoyingly having to set it each time). The readings themselves seem to be very accurate, and the app has a very nice pictorial representation of where your reading sits - again something that other apps would do well to copy. It has the benefit of folding into a neatly portable device, should you wish to take it with you somewhere. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use blood pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I found this very good at taking my blood pressure. It very easily connects to iPhone by just tapping it onto phone. I have it synced with my apple health data on my iPhone so I can save a record of all my health data. I found it a good buy from amazon and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McKenna

customer_reviews.title: How it works
customer_reviews.text: Opened box tonight for first time... green light flashed when I removed tab that said pull here... Down loaded app onto iPad apple... all good... but device won’t connect
customer_reviews.author: paul foster

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device....I used to have the withings one before and it was always tempremental and would only take 1reading in 5attempts and needed the moon and the stars to align before it would actually take a reading in the first place....this one I’ve just opened today straight out the box and works first time...no hassle easy to use and links perfectly with my iPhone X.... well done Qardio...I don’t usually write reviews but was compelled by a fantastic product !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gettign Error Code Z6
customer_reviews.text: Despite resetting the Qardio Arm and Removing and reinstalling battery I keep getting error Code Z6. brand new unit - gave me BP readings 2 times and since than error code.
customer_reviews.author: vivek sharma

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and app.. readings easily sent to but recommend a screenshot of results be sent to doctors as the app creates too many pages according to my doctor but ease of use is excellent
customer_reviews.author: citroenchris

customer_reviews.title: I did have to put in a little more effort that I'd like to setup the device initially
customer_reviews.text: Works well with no problems. I did have to put in a little more effort that I'd like to setup the device initially, but once done, it connects effortlessly every time. I did have the same experience as other in that the included batteries were dead on arrival so I had to go out and buy some more before the gadget could be used. The design and build quality is good, contrary to other reviews. I'd recommend this little, potentially life-saving, device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A stylish, quality and usefull product!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very stylish and of good quality. Most importanantly it's very easy to use - therefore you do actually WANT to use it. The important task of monitoring your blood pressure becomes a game. GREAT! Time will tell on durability, but the 3 year warranty is very reassuring.
customer_reviews.author: dormanb

customer_reviews.title: Worked well.. but only twice.
customer_reviews.text: Not much point in a product that does nothing after three uses. Needs a better approach to turning on/off before it should have been released. Dissapointed and am returning
customer_reviews.author: D. Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not very accurate, tried it against two other devices and this one always has the most way out reading.
customer_reviews.author: ShaunH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, accurate readings and can pop in my bag when out
customer_reviews.text: Fab, easy to use and accurate readings. Love that the readings are sent to my phone app automatically. You can also set it to take one - three readings at a time. I bought this as needed something easy to pop in my handbag and use when out, this has been perfect! Have had it for quite a while now and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Moody Miss

customer_reviews.title: I was feeling low, tired with constant headaches. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was feeling low, tired with constant headaches. GP thought it was anxiety but the blood pressure test he gave me was a bit high, but it went no further. I bought Qardio and monitored for a week and the results showed I had borderline hypertension stage 2. I showed the results to the doctor and was put on ACE inhibitors that day. Blood pressure is now normal. With this device I was able to show that I was suffering with clear data...a potential lifesaver? I think so
customer_reviews.author: S P Poole

customer_reviews.title: Unusable with iOS - Crashing App
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless with iOS crashes app after taking any reading. Tried with two accounts on different iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: T3Jn

customer_reviews.title: It works well, I trust it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and maintains good records via the app. My previous one was cheaper, bulkier, more complex to use and didn’t last long. Hopefully this will last longer
customer_reviews.author: David Mather

customer_reviews.title: Test
customer_reviews.text: Great product seems to be accurate very hard to gauge unless you take it with you to the doctors
customer_reviews.author: bez

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says. Good product
customer_reviews.text: I find this product very efficient and useful especially as I get to use my phone to record the readings.
customer_reviews.author: Nieves

customer_reviews.title: First class product
customer_reviews.text: Such a useful way of checking blood pressure by recording everything on your iPhone. This is a very neat product which could easily be packed in a bag for holidays. Plus whenever you use it, it will record the place where the BP was taken.
customer_reviews.author: A Gillett

customer_reviews.title: App renders this device USELESS.
customer_reviews.text: The app required to run this device is defective. It crashes repetitively even after unlinking the photo album. Very disappointed. Better off with conventional BP device.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Once switched on it works like a dream but the constant faff of getting it ...
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing wrong with this device that a simple on-off switch wouldn't cure. Once switched on it works like a dream but the constant faff of getting it to switch on in the first place (it uses some sort of sensor to detect whether the cuff is open for use or wrapped for storage) may well contribute to the blood pressure
customer_reviews.author: idris yddraig

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use the monitor I have to take off the battery cover (sometimes more than once) to get the unit to switch on. I also tend to forget the Bluetooth connection and re-pair it. Its a shame as its accurate and has great software for the Iphone just takes a while to set up each time. Its very hit and miss and I think after reading the reviews this is a common fault.
customer_reviews.author: sangmoosa

customer_reviews.title: Smart blood pressure monitor
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best blood pressure monitors I have used, So easy to set up and use on your smartphone The information stored is very comprehensive and can be easily accessible and easily shared with your doctors by email. It is a little bit pricey but I got mine as advertised as opened box which saved me 2/3rds off the price so I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, problematic setup.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: accurate, easy to use (once setup), compact. Cons: setup! Took forever to get up and running and syncing with the app. Other than setup problems it's a great portable product.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamergirl32

customer_reviews.title: Smart and simple
customer_reviews.text: I favour tech that integrates with apple health and watch
customer_reviews.author: janet.lewis1@btinternet.com

customer_reviews.title: Not brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Great in theory, but why didn't they just put an "on" button on it, instead of the terrible auto sensing, as it takes a few goes to get it to talk to your phone, by which time your BP has gone up as its so bloody annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good item
customer_reviews.text: Very good blood pressure monitor the fact you can show your doctor the results is very handy
customer_reviews.author: Big sam

customer_reviews.title: Intersting
customer_reviews.text: Ok works as it should. Not sure it’s 100% accurate. Use as a guide
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cheverton

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for sending a replacement so promptly when my first one broke. I really appreciated it. And good customer service on phone. I’m not giving you 5 stars due to original broken item but 4 stars for trying.
customer_reviews.author: Estella

customer_reviews.title: This is good but could be smaller and less cumbersome on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is good but could be smaller and less cumbersome on the arm- records well to the iPhone and keeps a record
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Waterhouse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent QardioArm seller great
customer_reviews.text: QardioArm Wireless Blood Pressure Monitor: Excellent product best I found till now very accurate and efficieint
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Quality great item well worth the money works well
customer_reviews.text: Was so easy to set up lovely blood pressure monitor best iv seen quality like very much I was a bit apprehensive buying but I’m so pleased I’d recommend if you suffer like I do With blood pressure for years 😊
customer_reviews.author: pauleen elliott

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for the convenience but probably worth it....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, accurate as far as i can tell (compared to my Doc's measurements) and the app makes keeping a record simple and quick. Makes a tedious job a bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Storey

customer_reviews.title: Really works for me. Looks great and performs well!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that doesn't look like it belongs in a hospital. The packaging, the App and the product all look great and perform well. I have to measure BP twice a day and it fits well with my lifestyle. Really nice and would thoroughly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Sargeant

customer_reviews.title: Good reading all the time
customer_reviews.text: Works well and grips onto the airm. Good reading all the time. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Faulty item
customer_reviews.text: Faulty item. Didn’t work with batteries included. I noticed in reviews this is a common issue. I replaced batteries with new Duracell batteries, it connected after several attempts, but haven’t been able to get it to switch on since
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: had to return to amazon as the readings were wildly innacurate. Not what you need when measuring BP for health
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Good kit but flat batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work well, but batteries needed to be replaced immediately as they would not operate the device. Although it was not advertised as syncing with my Fitbit HR Charge, it is a shame that it does not do so. Maybe they will add that function in the future?
customer_reviews.author: LEWISmart

customer_reviews.title: Compact and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and also seems accurate compared with my previous Withings one. The Apps good but HealthKit sync is a bit hit and miss. It generally works eventually. Would but again.
customer_reviews.author: Tramplite

customer_reviews.title: Very short battery life
customer_reviews.text: I used this machine twice but when I tried to use it for a third time (within 3 weeks of purchase), the batteries were flat. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R D.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Trouble connecting to the Bluetooth, the time it would connect it failed every time to get a reading. I didn't keep it and returned it
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit. Very helpful to measure heart and blood pressure
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Very good tool. Easy to use and high quality instrument. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and well presented results. Very well made; a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use and as it records ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use and as it records the readings for you there is no need to have to write them down or try to remember them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor,  app is handy
customer_reviews.text: Setting up the app on a few devices and figuring out how to use it properly was a bit difficult at first but once you understand how, it is easy to use and good to have a record of the data in the app
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: annoyed that they did not make it clear that this will not work on phones 2 years old
customer_reviews.author: MR JM SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with the ease of use and that it works well with Apple's Health app on iOS.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L. J. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful tech gadget with a purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Does what it says. Beautiful. I now have a daily record of my blood pressure that can be shown to my doctor. And it looks just great too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cantliffe

customer_reviews.title: Caution about results
customer_reviews.text: make sure you take this to the doctors when you go and compare results with the doctors professional equipment. Although a good product; results were a bit variable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S.

customer_reviews.title: It quickly connected to my iPhone 6 and integrates with ...
customer_reviews.text: It quickly connected to my iPhone 6 and integrates with apple health superb. The information even uploads to my doctors system via the "patient access" app and my doctor is impressed. The device is very portable and I use at work, which my colleagues are now regularly asking to test their BP.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok a bit difficult to use but will get easier with time
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little device. initially had difficulty linking it to my IPhone but soon realised it uses Near Field Communication NFC to link but once I was over this hurdle it has been great. Would recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product... Easy to set up (pairing worked first time), easy to use - I'm using it several times a week for a few months, and it works right first time, every time. Very good data management (nice graphs of historical data.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. W. Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I have tested it against other blood pressure monitors and it appears just as accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Heliczer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of kit. Easy go set up and use
customer_reviews.author: K. C. Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product

product_meta.title: QardioArm Smart Blood Pressure Monitor: Wireless, Medically Accurate, Easy to Use, Compact Digital Upper Arm Cuff. Free App for iOS, Android, Kindle, Apple Watch. Syncs with Apple and Samsung Health
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Arctic White

QardioArm wireless blood pressure monitor syncs to your smartphone or tablet over bluetooth with simple, one step setup; automatic storage of every reading to track health over time.

Best electronic blood pressure system for adult men and women with high or low blood pressure who need quick and reliable results on a regular basis; FDA and clinically validated for accuracy. The compact design of this digital blood pressure machine means you can use it anytime or anywhere; slide it in your pocket or purse for convenient bp monitoring away from home.

Use the free Qardio App to keep track of results on your favorite device; integrates with Apple Health for iPhone or iPad, Apple Watch, and Samsung Health for Android devices. Share your data automatically with family, or send your results via email to the doctor from our secure, HIPAA compliant cloud; pair with up to eight smart phones or tablets.



INGREDIENTS
Not applicable

MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION


BOX CONTAINS
QardioArm Wireless Blood Pressure Monitor; User Manual, Quick Start Guide, 4x AAA Batteries

See more
feature_bullets: CLINICAL ACCURACY AT HOME and ON-THE-GO: easily monitor your blood pressure in the comfort of your home, when traveling, or at work, trusted by healthcare professionals. Refer to the manual for the best results.

EASY SETUP: connects to your smartphone via free App. Works with Apple Watch or Android Wear (iOS 10.0 or later, Kindle, Android 5 or later, Android Wear and Apple Watch. Requires Bluetooth 4.0.and up).

SMART DESIGN: this stylish, very light and portable, one-piece wide-range cuff fits standard to large adult upper arms 8.7-14.6 in circumference (22-37cm), fully wireless, light, discrete. Battery life up to a year of frequent use.
SECURE DATA MANAGEMENT: store, monitor, track your progress in your app, on demand sharing with your family or doctor (in app or via email).
ADVANCED FEATURES: measurement charts, multi-user, reminders, add notes, irregular heart beat detection

DATA SHARE: can be paired with up to eight smart phones or tablets at any given time. Share your data automatically with friends and family using the in-app function or send your results to your doctor via email.
